Perfect game if you like to play with preteen immature idiots who ruin every game by doing everything by force with no strategy and thinking. Yet you can't quit because the system punishes you (instead of the idiot who coded your matchmaking function) Trying to get rid of them just gives you 7 days of cooldown. Dear creators, you have lost control over this game and your inability to fix it just making old fans lose any hope they have left in this community. So as someone who was there from 2003, I do hope this cancer of a game makes you fail as a company and you continue to lose money.
